name: Ravanasan - The Awakening of Undead
description:
Ravanasan - The Beginning is a Role Playing 2D Game which is based on the Epic story of Ramayana. The Game has 3 Playable Levels for now in which you have to fight with Ravana army. In Each Level you have to complete given objectives in order to proceed next level.

The Game contains magnificent handcraft graphics with better physics and awesome Graphical User Interface which increases user experience and good gameplay.

There is also a Map which is use to access Unlocked Level and keep track of the progress of Game.

There are 3 Levels for now with small objectives to complete further rounds

Level 1 - The Green Ghati

Level 2 - The Black Forest

Level 3 - The Miraculous Hills

Things to be Added in Further Updates

1 - Shop (In-App Purchase)

2 - More Levels

3 - Cloud Save

The Game is in development phase so don't expect it to be perfect. There are some bugs and problems which have to fixed before launching it to Playstore and Apple Store.

(To get the Full Featured Pro Version of this game before it's launched please donate us.)

Thanks,

Miscreality Studios
